title: Could Applied Digital Be the Best Under-The-Radar AI Stock?
author: Leo Sun
description: Applied Digital, a data center company, is pivoting from serving Bitcoin miners to providing cloud-based AI services. However, this strategic shift has been costly, and the company is now looking to sell its cloud services business to focus on becoming a real estate investment trust (REIT). The article suggests that this transition could make Applied Digital a more stable and potentially dividend-paying company in the long run.

title: Prediction: Nvidia Stock Is Going to Soar After May 1

title: Why Nebius Group Stock Soared Today

description: Nebius Group, an AI cloud infrastructure company, is seeing its shares surge after major tech companies like Microsoft and Meta Platforms announced plans to continue investing in AI infrastructure. title: Why Nvidia Stock Bounded Higher Thursday

Meta Platforms reported better-than-expected revenue and earnings, and also announced a significant increase in its capital expenditure budget, with a focus on AI. This suggests that Meta Platforms is investing heavily in AI, which would benefit Nvidia as the leading supplier of GPUs for AI applications.
